Uses of Class
adventure.Room

    • Uses of Room in adventure

      Methods in adventure that return Room 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Room Player.getCurrentRoom()
      Return the current room for this player.
      Room Room.getExit(java.lang.String direction)
      Return the room that is reached if we go from this room in direction "direction".
      Methods in adventure with parameters of type Room 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Player.setCurrentRoom(Room room)
      Set the current room for this player.
      void Room.setExit(java.lang.String direction, Room neighbor)
      Define an exit from this room.
